about.title: About TNOR Marketing
about.subtitle: Your Digital Success Partner
about.description: Based in Montreal, TNOR Marketing is a Google certified Digital Marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses establish and grow their online presence. We combine creativity with data-driven strategies to deliver exceptional results.

certified.title: Google Certified
certified.description: Recognized expertise in digital marketing and Google services

innovative.title: Data-Driven
innovative.description: Strategic decisions backed by analytics and market insights

results.title: Client-Focused
results.description: Dedicated to delivering exceptional results for our clients

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: TNOR Marketing transformed our digital presence completely. Their SEO strategies helped us reach the top of local search results.

items.name: Marc Dubois
items.text: Their social media management has brought us so many new customers. The team is professional and always delivers results.

items.name: Emily Chen
items.text: The website they created for us is beautiful and performs amazingly. Our conversion rate has increased by 150%.
